name: The Phantom Knights of Tear Scale
text: You can discard 1 card; send 1 "Phantom Knights" card from your Deck to the GY, except "The Phantom Knights of Tear Scale". If another "Phantom Knights" card(s) is banished from your GY, while this card is in your GY: You can Special Summon this card, but banish it when it leaves the field. You can only use each effect of "The Phantom Knights of Tear Scale" once per turn.
